doc: First, I'll say that I'm aware of #153. However, what I'm trying to achieve is probably much simpler.
I'm trying to control the time option already accessible from the double-rightclick menu through the code.
I've went through the docs but was unable to find anyway to achieve that. Unsure if it's a missing feature, missing docs or simply impossible to do right now.
Ultimately, all I'm trying to do is plot temperature measurements over time :)
